channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: From law to landscapes, Belvedere artist finds first solo stage in Big Apple
item.description: al real estate analyst's 2010 painting class gift from wife leads to debut solo show.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Everyday Encounters: A pharmacist explores her intuitive side through sound-bath healing
item.description: Balancing her "medicine side" and "witchy side," local pharmacist finds growing demand for sound bath healing sessions.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Dead coyote in Belvedere likely pup of mated pair, expert says
item.description: Second coyote death in a year raises questions about poisoning, while experts say lethal control methods don't work anyway.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Ex-official sues Tiburon over alleged pregnancy harassment
item.description: Fired town official claims colleagues mocked "pregnant belly and pregnant ass" while manager refused to intervene.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez
